snippet: State proposals broadening financial aid access are pending, but on Thursday a group of advocacy groups awarded scholarships to students who entered the country illegally.
abstract: Fund for Public Advocacy, a nonprofit arm of the office of New York City's public advocate, announces the 10 recipients of a new college scholarship for illegal immigrants, the first such program in New York State; first round of scholarships was open only to undergraduates in the City University of New York system.
lead_paragraph: State proposals broadening financial aid access are pending, but on Thursday a group of advocacy groups awarded scholarships to students who entered the country illegally.

headline.seo: As Aid Bill Lingers, Illegal Immigrants in New York Get Scholarships
headline.main: Illegal Immigrants Get Scholarships While Aid Bill Idles
